---
title: "config.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines a custom contact link that will be displayed in the sidebar of new issues created in the GitHub repository. This link directs users to the Flipt Discord community.

## Symbols
### `contact_links`
#### Description
This section defines a list of custom contact links to be displayed in the issue sidebar.

#### Internal Logic
- Each link is defined as a dictionary with the following keys:
    - `name`: The display name of the link.
    - `url`: The URL the link points to.
    - `about`: A brief description of the link's purpose.

#### Side Effects
This configuration modifies the default issue template in the GitHub repository, adding a custom contact link to the sidebar. 

## Configuration
This file configures the display and behavior of contact links within the GitHub issue template.
